Lagos State Junior Model College Kankon bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke steeti dị na mpaghara Kankon Badagry, Lagos Steeti.
N'ihi mgbanwe na nhazi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos Steeti, e wepụtara Lagos State Junior Model College site na Lagos State Model College Kankon na 2003.
Tinyere kọleji nlereanya ndị ọzọ na steeti ahụ, Lagos State Junior Model College, Kankon na-arụ ọrụ usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ niile.
